content:
Hello all! I was just popping in to let you know that on April 31st, I am teaching a virtual workshop with the Harvard Libraries on Embeddable 3D Data Design. You can sign up with a HarvardKey at the link, or you can email Jess Cohen-Tanugi for a key to get in.

2.png

Additionally, I'm going to be presenting here at the Dataverse on April 1st on visualizing the Dataverse in 3D WebXR. It would be nice to see you all there. :blush:
